message.content:
I need to identify the expense line item from the statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income based on the balance sheet provided.

Looking at the balance sheet, I can see that "Accumulated Depreciation" is the only expense-related item shown. Accumulated depreciation represents the total depreciation expense that has been recorded over time.

From the balance sheet:
- Initial value of Accumulated Depreciation (2023-12-31): 0.00
- End value of Accumulated Depreciation (2024-02-05): 120631.67

This indicates that during this period, a depreciation expense of 120,631.67 was recorded.

```json
{"solution": {'initial value': '0.00', 'end value': '120631.67'}}
```
